pages.text: Hexo ConfigurationDocs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.htmlSource: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/Sitetitle: Hexosubtitle: â€˜â€™description: â€˜â€™keywords:author: John Doelanguage: entimezone: â€˜â€™ URLSet your site url here. For example, if you use GitHub Page, set url as â€˜https://username.github.io/project'url: http://example.compermalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/permalink_defaults:pretty_urls: trailing_index: true # Set to false to remove trailing â€˜index.htmlâ€™ from permalinks trailing_html: true # Set to false to remove trailing â€˜.htmlâ€™ from permalinks Directorysource_dir: sourcepublic_dir: publictag_dir: tagsarchive_dir: archivescategory_dir: categoriescode_dir: downloads/codei18n_dir: :langskip_render: Writingnew_post_name: :title.md # File name of new postsdefault_layout: posttitlecase: false # Transform title into titlecaseexternal_link: enable: true # Open external links in new tab field: site # Apply to the whole site exclude: â€˜â€™filename_case: 0render_drafts: falsepost_asset_folder: truerelative_link: falsefuture: truehighlight: enable: true line_number: true auto_detect: false tab_replace: â€˜â€™ wrap: true hljs: falseprismjs: enable: false preprocess: true line_number: true tab_replace: â€˜â€™ Home page settingpath: Root path for your blogs index page. (default = â€˜â€™)per_page: Posts displayed per page. (0 = disable pagination)order_by: Posts order. (Order by date descending by default)index_generator: path: â€˜â€™ per_page: 10 order_by: -date Category & Tagdefault_category: uncategorizedcategory_map:tag_map: Metadata elementshttps://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/metameta_generator: true Date / Time formatHexo uses Moment.js to parse and display dateYou can customize the date format as defined inhttp://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/date_format: YYYY-MM-DDtime_format: HH:mm:ss updated_option supports â€˜mtimeâ€™, â€˜dateâ€™, â€˜emptyâ€™updated_option: â€˜mtimeâ€™ PaginationSet per_page to 0 to disable paginationper_page: 10pagination_dir: page Include / Exclude file(s)include:/exclude: options only apply to the â€˜source/â€˜ folderinclude:exclude:ignore: ExtensionsPlugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/theme: yilia DeploymentDocs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deploymentdeploy: type: git repo: git@github.com:chis42/chis42.github.io.git branch: master jsonContent: meta: false pages: false posts: title: true date: true path: true text: false raw: false content: false slug: false updated: false comments: false link: false permalink: false excerpt: false categories: false tags: true
